unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, right? My grandfather, farmer Sharma from Bihar, always said so! He used desi cow dung as fertilizer since before 1947. Now everyone's talking about it. Even I started a small patch in my Mumbai balcony at 6:00 PM on 26/01/2023. It's tough, but worth it. Wish more people did this! My friend Meena tried composting too on 1/1/24. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Organic farming is the way to go, right? My grandfather, farmer Sharma from Bihar, always said so! He used desi cow dung as fertilizer since before one thousand nine hundred and forty seven. Now everyone's talking about it. Even I started a small patch in my Mumbai balcony at six P M on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three. It's tough, but worth it. Wish more people did this! My friend Meena tried composting too on first january two thousand and twenty four. Jai Kisan!
